metadata.title: CVE-2024-50171 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: systemport: fix potential memory leak in bcm_sysport_xmit()The bcm_sysport_xmit() returns NETDEV_TX_OK without freeing skbin case of dma_map_single() fails, add dev_kfree_skb() to fix it.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
